schemas.name: common.graphql
schemas.content:
"Date custom scalar (ISO string)"
scalar Date

type Query {
  """
  Returns the timezone offset of the server
  """
  serverTimezoneOffset: Int!
}

type Mutation {
  """
  A test mutation that returns the input value
  """
  test(value: Date!): Date
}

type PageInfo {
  hasPreviousPage: Boolean!
  hasNextPage: Boolean!
  startCursor: String!
  endCursor: String!
  totalCount: Int!
}

input PaginationFilter {
  """
  The cursor of the first item to be returned
  """
  after: String
  """
  The number of items to be returned
  """
  first: Int
  """
  Sort criteria
  """
  sort: [SortCriteria!]
}

input SortCriteria {
  """
  Field name to be sorted
  """
  field: String!
  """
  Sort direction (ASC, DESC)
  Default = ASC
  """
  direction: SortDirection = ASC
}

enum SortDirection {
  ASC
  DESC
}
